Name: Deep Space Classic
About the game: An alien force is threatening to destroy the stability of the galaxy! It's up to you and your fellow Spacefleet officers to eliminate them and restore peace to the United Alliance of Planets! Or take the role of the unknown creature and eliminate the invading Spacefleet forces! Gameplay Horror Atmospheric and hand-crafted maps give the game a tense feeling Action Fight aliens on a ship or on a planet, there's tons of bullets to go around! Strategy Tons of weapons, gadgets, and operators make matches intense and skill-orientated! Features Top-Down multiplayer action, with unique characters and weapons Intense online horror & action Multiplayer teams (Alien & Spacefleet) with many unique team classes All online content can be earned! No Pay-To-Win! Heavy Sci-Fi inspiration from media such as Star Trek, Alien, and Starship Troopers! Fun & challenging currency & leveling system A completely indie experience made by one person (DLC Exclusive) Online Co-Op or Singleplayer campaign A Strong Community This game has built up a strong community where members come together to discuss the game, talk with the developer, and queue up for matches! Check out the community hub for a link to the Deep Space discord! You Get A Voice Best of all the game is created by a single developer meaning your voice gets heard! Have a problem? Have a suggestion? You get a voice, and many implemented features are community requests!
